text: Patsy Ann "Pat" Danner (born January 13, 1934) is an American politician. She formerly represented the Missouri's 6th congressional district in the United States House of Representatives as a Democrat from 1993 through 2001. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Missouri Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Louisville, Kentucky Category:Members of the Missouri General Assembly
title: Pat Danner
